analysis.description:
EtheremonWorld.withdrawEther (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#283-300) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _sendTo.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#297-298)

Reentrancy in EtheremonWorld.catchMonster (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#497-538):
	External calls:
	- (class.classId,class.price,class.returnPrice,class.total,class.catchable) = data.getMonsterClass(_classId) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#502-504)
	- data.getMonsterDexSize(msg.sender) > maxDexSize (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#510-511)
	- totalBalance = safeAdd(msg.value,data.getExtraBalance(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#512-514)

	- objId = data.addMonsterObj(_classId,msg.sender,_name) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#526-527)
	- value = getRandom(STAT_MAX,uint8(i),lastHunter) + data.getElementInArrayType(ArrayType.STAT_START,uint64(_classId),i) (/unique_chucks/2/0x1fc7bd85293f3982f40d52698df8d26be89360d6.sol#530-534)
